data.prayer: Father, help the 375,325 believers in Batangas to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batangas, Philippines

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Batangas, Philippines.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Batangas, Philippines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 375,325 believers in Batangas, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Batangas, Philippines need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Batangas, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of Batangas, Philippines has a population of 2,694,400.

We estimate Batangas has 375,325 people who might know Jesus, 2,075,645 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 243,431 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Batangas, Philippines, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Batangas
location.cities_list: Batangas, Lipa City, Tanauan, Nasugbu, Santo Tomas
